ai-patthana15.63:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.63:0.3_0: ten kinds of sensual stimulation are deliver.
ai-patthana15.63:1.1_0: Sensual pleasures give rise to the skillful teaching by using them as good, unskillful is a cause.
ai-patthana15.63:1.1_1: Not by practice the skillful quality, they don’t arise because of the skillful.
ai-patthana15.63:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.63:2.1_0: Thinking: ‘Sensual pleasures don’t give rise to the unskillful. Not seeing the causes and conditions for the reason.’
ai-patthana15.63:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.63:2.1_3: (These two discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
